title: Find a Cure
tags: how to unlock find a cure
content:
say you need healing, she'll give you a look and say you seem healthy enough. Your next set of choices will look like this:

No good way of putting this. I... uh... have a tadpole in my head. More than tired. Something crawled into my eye. Right. Yes, I'm... very tired indeed.

If you tell her about the tadpole, you'll be presented with these choices:

You know of them? Can you help me? What other kinds are there? It's not like a frog hopped in my eye. Actually, never mind. I'll get help elsewh
